title: Register a lesson
displayType: How to display a lesson screen
limit_on_attendance_start: Limit on attendance period (start date and time)
limit_on_attendance_end: Limit on attendance period (end date and time)
do_not_set_start: Do not set (release since the course start date and time)
do_not_set_end: Do not set (release until the course end date and time)

validation.invalid_range_date: The course end date and time is set before the course start date and time.
validation.date_required: Enter the date. (time can be omitted)
validation.name_already_exists: A course with the same name already exists

explain_for_creating_on_webview_mode: *Processing may take some time depending on the file size and communication speed, so please be patient.
